items.title: Senior Developer
items.description: Led development of cloud-native applications using modern technologies. Mentored junior developers and established best practices.
highlights: Architected and implemented microservices using Node.js and TypeScript
Reduced deployment time by 60% through CI/CD pipeline optimization
Led a team of 5 developers on a major platform migration project

items.title: Full Stack Developer
items.description: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications for various clients in the e-commerce sector.
highlights: Built responsive web applications using React and Node.js
Optimized database queries resulting in 40% faster load times

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description: Created modern, responsive user interfaces for client websites and web applications.
highlights: Developed pixel-perfect implementations of designer mockups
Implemented automated testing reducing bug reports by 30%
